cn.title: 警惕 GooglePlay 商店中假冒 Bitpie App 的骗局

message.data: 近期，经用户反馈，我们发现 google play 商店存在多家冒用 Bitpie 名字的骗子 APP ，试图骗取用户资产。
以上均为假 Bitpie APP，请大家对虚假信息予以警惕，不要在任何网站输入助记词，也不要把助记词透露给任何人，谨防资产损失。
下载安装 Bitpie，请大家认准 Bitpie 官网：bitpie.com、piepiewallet.com、bitpiecn.com、bitpiehk.com、bitpieasia.com、bitpie.one
如何判断自己是否受影响？请按以下方式自查是否为正版 Bitpie：
1.Google Play：请确认所下载的 Bitpie 开发者为 getcai ，除此以外，其他所有 Bitpie App 均为假冒应用；
2. App Store：请确认所下载的 Bitpie 开发者为 BITPIE HK LIMITED，除此以外，其他所有 Bitpie App 均为假冒应用；
3. 其他渠道：请谨慎防范任何与 Bitpie 官网（bitpie.com、piepiewallet.com、bitpiecn.com、bitpiehk.com、bitpieasia.com、bitpie.one）相似的网址，从非官网渠道下载的均存在巨大风险。
可能受影响的用户该怎么办？
1. 请立即停用在此期间创建或导入过假 Bitpie App 的钱包的地址。
2. 从 Bitpie 官网重新下载安装 Bitpie 并创建新钱包。
3. 将存在风险的钱包地址中的资产尽快转至新钱包地址。
同时，如果你发现了类似骗局，请通过邮件 service@bitpie.com 反馈给我们，感谢您的支持。
比特派团队

en.title: Beware of fake Bitpie App on Google Play Store

message.data: Recently, we found that there are many fraudulent apps on the google play store that use the Bitpie name to defraud users' assets.
The above are all fake Bitpie APP, please do not enter mnemonic words on any website, and do not disclose the mnemonic words to anyone, to avoid assets lost.
Before download and install Bitpie wallet, please make sure that it is downloaded from official Bitpie website: bitpie.com、piepiewallet.com、bitpiecn.com、bitpiehk.com、bitpieasia.com、bitpie.one
Please check whether to download the Bitpie wallet in the following way:
1. Google Play: Please confirm the developer of the Bitpie is Getcai, except for this, all other Bitpie App are counterfeit applications;
2. App Store: Please confirm that the Bitpie developer you downloaded is BITPIE HK LIMITED. Except for this, all other Bitpie Apps are counterfeit applications;

3. Other channels: Please be cautious to prevent any URL similar to Bitpie's official website (bitpie.com, piepiewallet.com, bitpiecn.com, bitpiehk.com, bitpieasia.com, bitpie.one), and downloading from non-official channels involves huge risks.
What if I am an affected user?
1. Please immediately deactivate the addresses of wallets that have created or imported to fake Bitpie App during this period.
2. Re-download and install Bitpie from Bitpie's official website and create a new wallet.
3. Transfer the assets in the risky wallet address to the new wallet address as soon as possible.
At the same time, if you find a similar website and someone claiming to be Bitpie customer service to contact you proactively, please send an email to service@bitpie.com, Thank you for your support.

Bitpie team
November, 30, 2021
